plot: John Oliver discusses freight trains and railroads, how they've put profits over safety, and, crucially, what shows he watched as a child that explain - everything.

John Oliver points out the freight trains running in railroads, how they've running these days. Their main focus is now on profits mainly and which shifted safety in to number 4 in their priority list. Finally he shows the world of trains in its current from through one of the beloved children's program.—Niaz Islam Arif
